title: Lori Belilove and company: the art of Isadora Duncan
brief_description: Compilation of excerpts of eight dances performed by Lori Belilove & Company celebrating the legacy of Isadora Duncan. Combines improvised outdoor footage of company in performance around the world with additional footage from the films “Isadora Duncan: movement of the soul” and “Oneiro: in the shadow of Isadora” (also held in collection). Choreography by Lori Belilove after dances by Isadora Duncan.
